page.title: 19SUMMERCROFT JUNIOR SCHOOL
page.content: The school was built in 1963 and has eight classrooms and one teacher to each class. We come to school 5 days a week from 8.55 till 3.15pm with a break at 10.20am and one from noon until 1.10pm. In the afternoon we usually have games. You stay at this school for 4 years. We have about 6 holidays a year but the main ones are at Easter, Christmas and summer. There are about 240 pupils in the school. After you have been to this school you go to a secondary school where you stay until you are 16 or 18. School uniform consists of grey shorts, grey socks, grey or white shirt, grey or yellow jumper and yellow and green tie. Girls do not usually wear uniform. The other schools have different uniforms. There is also a grey school blazer and cap with a yellow and green badge.
